title: Dads That Can Get It w/ Kulap Vilaysack
description: Oooooh, sharing their #authentic selves has June and Jessica feeling like they’re running through the streets naked (but in a good way?) The girls start to share poignant stories about their fathers until they are very RUDELY interrupted. They explore why socializing again makes them feel like aliens and why it can be so hard to ask for help. Then, they are joined by their dear friend, Queen of Cozy, Kulap Vilaysack (writer, actor, activist, film maker and host of Add to Cart podcast) to discuss her breathtaking documentary, Origin Story, about finding her biological father and what constitutes resort wear.
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (June Diane Rapheal, Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair)
